entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING ENDED, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:09 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -22.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -26.4°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
